attributes.action: Let the board of RBS resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They are lucky to be in a job after the mess they caused, let alone still getting any bonuses!!!!

Call their bluff - don't they know there is a recession on and jobs are hard to find?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
